title: Symptom tracking supports accurate reporting to providers
description: Symptom tracking supports accurate reporting to providers
content:
Scenario: Symptom tracking supports accurate reporting to providers
    Given David's Alzheimer's symptoms fluctuate and progress
    And accurate symptom reporting is essential for care
    When the healthcare_elohim tracks symptoms
    Then it should maintain detailed symptom logs
    And it should identify patterns and changes over time
    And it should prepare symptom summaries for appointments
    And provider understanding should be improved by detailed tracking
    And caregiver observation should enhance medical accuracy
